entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 03:47 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
